metadata.title: What is the difference between Voice Kit RA6/4/2 and VK-RA8M1?

sections.content:
Question:
What is the difference between Voice Kit RA6/4/2 and VK-RA8M1?
Answer:
VUI software solution perspective, the VK-RA8M1 can run either VCR (Voice Command Recognition) or NLU (Natural Language Understanding) which modeling tool are both provided by Cyberon. On the other hand, Voice Kit RA6/4/2 series supports VCR (Voice Command Recognition) from Cyberon.
For hardware functionality difference, please check our kit landing pages from https://www.renesas.com/us/en/key-technologies/artificial-intelligence/voice
Suitable Products
RA8M1
